name: Moralspirit
description:
Moral spirit is a turn based RPG with no combat, instead the 'combat' revolves around talking to your opponents using different types of moves. It utilises the press-turn system used in games like Digital Devil Saga and Shin Megami Tensei: Nocturne.

You take control of a man named Evan. He goes out with his close friend Sebastian for a walk in the park, until they are interrupted by a girl who seems to have come from a strange cult.

Controls:

  • WASD - Walk
  • E - Talk/Next dialogue
  • X - skip dialogue
  • L-shift - Walk faster

You can change these controls in the game.

Credits:

  • Programmer, writer, designer, artist, composer: Prownie
  • Additional art (such as furniture): Joe
